import axios from 'axios' import React from 'react' import "./MyInterests.scss" const APIURL= "http://localhost:8080/interests" class MyInterests extends React.Component { state = { id: "", name: "", activities: [], } handleInterests = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post(`${APIURL}`, { name: e.target.name.value, activities: e.target.activities.value }) .then(res => { console.log(e.target) console.log(res.data); this.props.history.push('/profile') alert('thank you!') }) .catch(err => { console.error(err) }) console.log(e.target) } render () { return ( <>

Chose 5 activities that describes you the most:

) } } export default MyInterests
